BodyName: Committee on Fire and Emergency Management

Items.Title: Oversight - E-Bikes and Lithium-ion Battery Fire Safety.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - E-Bikes and Lithium-ion Battery Fire Safety.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the fire department to develop an informational campaign to educate the public on fire risks posed by powered mobility devices
Items.MatterName: Requiring the fire department to develop an informational campaign to educate the public on fire risks posed by powered mobility devices.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale, lease, and rental of powered bicycles, powered mobility devices and storage batteries
Items.MatterName: Sale, lease, and rental of powered bicycles, powered mobility devices and storage batteries.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing food delivery workers with information on safety measures that mitigate the fire risks posed by powered mobility devices
Items.MatterName: Providing food delivery workers with information on safety measures that mitigate the fire risks posed by powered mobility devices.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing food delivery workers with information on safety measures that mitigate the fire risks posed by powered mobility devices
Items.MatterName: Providing food delivery workers with information on safety measures that mitigate the fire risks posed by powered mobility devices.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city fire code, in relation to prohibiting the sale of lithium-ion batteries assembled or reconditioned using cells removed from used batteries
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting the sale of lithium-ion batteries assembled or reconditioned using cells removed from used batteries.
